review_details: Came here to watch city v Leicester back again for cup final against Aston Villa great service at excellent prices staff really helpful and friendly watching the match was no trouble

What can I say superb trip great hosts great food and drink nice easy fishing. We were out for nearly 5 hours typical Greek fishing boat stopped 3 places for fishing before dropping anchor for a swim while the fish were cooked on the barbecue on the boat served with Greek salad and wine or beer. Only 4 of us on the boat and still went out and really looked after us. I will definitely go back loved it
Had a superb meal tonight kleftiko service excellent highly recommended returning soon spiros was extremely helpful and nice glass of house red

We have been eating at Nestors for about the last 10 years and have always had brilliant food. All the staff have been lovely. Last night we went to their new restaurant at the bottom of chipmunk mountain. Food service still amazing but now in a more beautiful setting. Nestors for us is still the best restaurant in Caleta, but it has very strong competition. Anyone booking all inclusive to Caleta is out of their mind.
